mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD_FREE /*테이블_자유게시판*/ SET TITLE = #{title} /*자유게시판제목*/ , CN = #{cn} /*자유게시판내용*/ , BOARD_FREE_CODE = #{boardFreeCode} /*자유게시판코드(01:잡담,02:정보,03:질문)*/ , LT_UPD_ID = #{loginInfo.userId} /*최종수정자ID*/ , LT_UPD_DTTI = NOW() /*최종수정일시*/ WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} /*게시글일련번호*/
UPDATE TB_BOARD_FREE /*테이블_자유게시판*/ SET USE_YN = 'N' /*자유게시판사용여부*/ , LT_UPD_ID = #{loginInfo.userId} /*최종수정자ID*/ , LT_UPD_DTTI = NOW() /*최종수정일시*/ WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} /*게시글일련번호*/
UPDATE TB_BOARD_FREE /*테이블_자유게시판*/ SET HIT = HIT + 1 /*자유게시판조회수*/ WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} /*게시글일련번호*/
